name.es,es_419: Seguir y Dejar de Seguir Automático en Twitter
name.ja: Twitter自動フォロー・アンフォロー
name.pt_BR,pt_PT: Seguir e Deixar de Seguir Automático no Twitter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_U: Grow Twitter/X Followers with auto Follow-Unfollow growth hack.
short.en_GB,et,fa,fi,fil,fr,gu,he,hi,hr,hu,id: Easily follow and unfollow users on Twitter with this extension.
short.es,es_419: Aumenta tus Seguidores de Twitter/X con el truco de crecimiento de Seguir y Dejar de Seguir automático.
short.ja: 自動フォロー・アンフォローの成長戦略でTwitter/Xのフォロワーを増やす.
short.pt_BR,pt_PT: Aumente Seguidores no Twitter/X com a estratégia de crescimento de Seguir e Deixar de Seguir automático.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,et,fa,fi,fil,:
Automatically follow Twitter accounts and build a high-quality audience of real and organic followers for your business. 

Twitter Auto Follow-Unfollow is more than a regular auto follow extension. It also unfollows accounts you followed before, so your following number stays reasonable.

👨🏻‍💻 Features
✓ Automatically follow the Followers of a Twitter account
✓ Automatically follow the Following of a Twitter account

✓ Automatically unfollow users who do not follow you
✓ Automatically unfollow users who you are following

✓ The process is being executed in the background
✓ A well-developed strategy to bypass restrictions
✓ Automatically retry after an error occurs

📌 Strategies to Prevent Being Limited
- For every 6 users followed, take a 10 minutes cooldown period
- You can customize the number of people and the number of minutes for cooldown in the settings.

🩹 Intelligent error handling
- If a request error occurs, pause for 30 minutes before retrying
- You can customize the number of minutes for pause in the settings

🟢 indicates the normal time interval for requests
🟠 indicates the cooldown period's time interval
🔴 indicates the time interval for request errors

📃 How to Start Following?
- Enter the Twitter username or open the extension on the Twitter user’s profile, and the extension will automatically fill in the username
- Select which List to Follow: Followers or Following
- Click the 'Start Following' Button

📃 How to Start Unfollowing?
- Switch to the second tab
- Choose the type of unfollowing
- Click the 'Start Unfollowing' button

📖❓ FAQ
❓Why can't we follow and unfollow an unlimited number of users?
Unfortunately, Twitter has limits, and these limits vary from account to account. To prevent future lockouts or account suspension, we limit the processing time and the number of follows and unfollows. We recommend using the extension sparingly to ensure its continuous functionality.

📬 Contact
If you have any questions or suggestions to improve the extension, please feel free to contact us at jfl913@gmail.com.

📃 Terms
You can automatically follow/unfollow 6 users every day. Upgrade to Pro, you can follow/unfollow 80 users per day.

🔒 Data Privacy
All the data you process stays on your local computer and never goes through our servers.

ℹ️ Disclaimer
Twitter/X is a trademark of Twitter/X, LLC. This extension is not affiliated with, endorsed by, sponsored by, or otherwise related to Twitter/X, LLC or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.
